FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the course.

FIELD.NAME: maildate
FIELD.COMMENT: Date for the Info Mail.

FIELD.NAME: submitdate
FIELD.COMMENT: Submission date for the project definitions

FIELD.NAME: deadline
FIELD.COMMENT: Deadline for the project submissions.

FIELD.NAME: mailtext
FIELD.COMMENT: Text for the Info Mail.

FIELD.NAME: rubric
FIELD.COMMENT: Rubric to grade projects. This is stored in JSON-Format.

FIELD.NAME: coursefiles
FIELD.COMMENT: The filemanager draft id for course files.

FIELD.NAME: submitrequire
FIELD.COMMENT: A list of the required objects for project submissions. This is in JSON-Format.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The userid of the teacher. This is used to display user information.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The course id of the teacher.

KEY.NAME: userid
KEY.COMMENT: The foreign key for the user id.

KEY.NAME: courseid
KEY.COMMENT: The foreign key for the course id.

FIELD.NAME: definition
FIELD.COMMENT: The definition of the project. This is stored in JSON-Format.

FIELD.NAME: submission
FIELD.COMMENT: The submission of the project. This is stored in JSON-Format.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The grade of the test with rubric data. This is stored in JSON-Format

FIELD.NAME: teacherid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the supervising teacher.

KEY.NAME: teacherid
KEY.COMMENT: The foreign key for the teacher id.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user id of the student. This is used to get account data for displaying.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the course which the student is assigned to.

FIELD.NAME: projectid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the student's project.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Status of the student. This is to substitute for user deletion.

KEY.NAME: userid
KEY.COMMENT: The foreign key for the user id.

KEY.NAME: courseid
KEY.COMMENT: The foreign key for the course id.

KEY.NAME: projectid
KEY.COMMENT: The foreign key for the project id.

FIELD.NAME: fileid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id given by the filemanager used to store the document. This is project specific.

FIELD.NAME: path
FIELD.COMMENT: The file path of the uploaded document.

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: Title of the document.

FIELD.NAME: note
FIELD.COMMENT: A small description of the document, optional.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of the file which indicates from where it was uploaded.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The status of the file. Deactivates if the file gets replaced with a new one.

FIELD.NAME: projectid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the project the document was uploaded for.

KEY.NAME: projectid
KEY.COMMENT: The foreign key for the project id.
